titleStmt.title: A call out of false worships. Written by one whom the people of the world call a Quaker, whose name is Richard Farnevvorth
titleStmt.author: R. F. (Richard Farnworth), d. 1666.

notesStmt.note: Copy filmed at UMI microfilm Early English Books 1641-1700 reel 2354 has pages cropped with some loss of text.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
